title: Executive Dashboard
content: Generate an executive-level BI dashboard summarizing KPIs, risks, and opportunities for enterprise decision-making.

title: Root Cause Analysis
content: Analyze a problem and identify root causes using structured reasoning and logical deduction.

title: Customer Retention Strategy
content: Create actionable strategies to improve retention and loyalty for enterprise customers.

title: Revenue Forecasting
content: Predict next quarter revenue using historical trends and market analysis.

title: Operational Efficiency
content: Identify inefficiencies in operations and propose optimized workflows.

title: Risk & Anomaly Detection
content: Detect potential risks or anomalies in business processes and data.
